backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a routine tracker backend with CRUD operations (add, edit, delete, mark complete, get) for routines stored in a Map, sorted by scheduled time.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features (routine list UI, add form, AI assistant, edit functionality, dashboard statistics) with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, and styling with descriptions of their functionality and purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space with warm earth tone palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Routine Tracker application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting up QueryClient, ThemeProvider, Layout, and organizing Dashboard, RoutineList, AddRoutineForm, and AIAssistant in a responsive grid with Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/AddRoutineForm.t: Form component for creating new routines with validation for required name and scheduled time fields, optional description textarea, and success/error toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AIAssistant.tsx: Chat interface component displaying conversation messages with AI assistant, including avatar, scrollable message area, and input form with auto-scroll and processing state handling.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Displays a dashboard with three stat cards (total routines, completed routines, streak) and a progress bar showing today's completion percentage. Uses the useRoutineStats hook and shows loading skeletons while data is fetching.
A dialog form component for editing existing routines with fields for name, scheduled time, and description. Includes validation, loading states, and uses the useRoutines hook to submit updates.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper component providing header with branding, hero section with gradient background, main content area, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution. Structures the overall page layout for the application.
frontend/src/components/RoutineList.tsx: Displays a scrollable list of routines with checkboxes for completion, edit and delete buttons, and shows routine details like scheduled time and description. Handles routine completion, deletion, and opens the edit form when needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Automatically recreates the actor when identity changes and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIAssistant.ts: Provides an AI assistant chatbot that responds to user queries about routines with contextual information based on current routine status. Handles greetings, progress queries, incomplete routine reminders, tips, and motivational messages using pattern matching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoutines.ts: React Query-based hook providing CRUD operations for routines (add, edit, delete, mark complete) with automatic cache invalidation and loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoutineStats.ts: Custom hook that calculates routine statistics including total routines, completed count, completion percentage, and a simple streak counter based on daily completion.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens defining a warm earth-tone color palette (terracotta primary, sage green accent) for both light and dark modes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts (Inter, Cal Sans), OKLCH-based color system, border radius variables, and animation keyframes for accordions.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features (routine CRUD, AI chat, dashboard, design system) and pending backend requirements (data model, AI logic) for a daily routine tracking app.
